title: Social Studies Learning Design Utilizing Intelligent Tutoring Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic social studies concepts and experience using digital devices
context.additional_context: Implementation of adaptive learning utilizing domain model reuse in intelligent tutoring systems within smartphone-based constrained environments.

learning_goals: One can explain strategies for reconstructing social studies learning content by analyzing the domain model of an intelligent tutoring system.
One can design at least two customized learning scenarios tailored to social studies topics by reusing existing domain models.
Formative assessments can measure the learning effectiveness of an intelligent tutoring system with over 80% accuracy.

resources: Social studies standard domain model template
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
